name: Stop N Shred
description: Stop N Shred started as just an idea a had in my head one night while trying to fall asleep. "Wouldn't a turn based skateboarding game be really cool?" At the time I thought it absolutly was, but as development went on I realized that it wasn't as fun as I had imagined. So while Stop N Shred didn't turn out to be much of a game I certainly learned a lot while developing it. I gained some confidence in my art skills, I learned a lot about level generation as well as learning some much needed skills about creating UI stuff in Unity. I still think there might be something to that concept but I don't think I'm personally the right person to make it a reality.
